long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web Highlighter is a light-weight and simple Chrome extension designed to help you capture and organize essential information from any webpage. Whether you're a student, researcher, professional, or just an avid reader, Web Highlighter makes it easy for you to highlight and save (download) key points from your online reading material. Best of all, it does so WITHOUT COLLECTING ANY OF YOUR DATA, ensuring your privacy. 

AND IT IS ABSOLUTELY FREE

Key Features:

Seamless Highlighting:
With Web Highlighter, you can effortlessly highlight text on any webpage. Simply select the text you want to highlight, and Web Highlighter will do the rest. The intuitive interface ensures a smooth and hassle-free experience.

Download Highlights:
Web Highlighter allows you to save all your highlights by downloading them as a text file. This feature is perfect for compiling notes, references, and important excerpts from your web browsing sessions.

No Data Collection:
Web Highlighter does not collect any data from your browsing activities. 

User-Friendly Interface:
Web Highlighter is designed with simplicity and ease of use in mind. The clean and intuitive interface ensures that you can start highlighting and saving text with minimal effort.

Who Can Benefit from Web Highlighter?

Students: Highlight important points from online textbooks, articles, and research papers to create study notes and references.
Researchers: Easily capture key information from multiple sources and compile it into a comprehensive document.
Professionals: Keep track of essential data, market research, and industry news without the hassle of manual note-taking.
Avid Readers: Mark and save memorable quotes, passages, and insights from your favorite blogs, articles, and online books.

How to Use Web Highlighter:

Install the Extension:
Download and install Web Highlighter from the Chrome Web Store. The installation process is quick and straightforward.

Start Highlighting:
Once installed, simply browse the web as usual. When you come across the text you want to highlight Click on the extension icon on the top. Then start highlighting, Your highlighted text will  instantly appear on the side panel.

Download Your Highlights:
Download all your  highlights with a click of the download button. You can download as a text file.

Get Started Today:
Transform your web browsing experience with Web Highlighter. Enhance your productivity, streamline your research, and make the most out of your time online with Web Highlighter.
